misc.post: Lol, @Tom: There are plenty more blasphemers in Hollywood and elsewhere who are living the good life and don’t believe in God or have anything good to say about him/her/it. There are also a great deal of religious individuals who are plagued with illness and, if living in America, are probably facing bankruptcy. On the other hand, I’d like to commend the author for being so level headed and fair. It’s nice to see someone give credit where credit is due despite the difference in beliefs.
misc.title: The Great Christopher Hitchens Has Lost His Voice
